create.create_table_guilds: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS guilds (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, guild_id integer NOT NULL, guild_name TEXT NOT NULL, UNIQUE(id, guild_id))
create.create_table_bank_accounts: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS guild_bank (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, guild_id integer NOT NULL, user_id integer NOT NULL, balance real DEFAULT 0, bot_use integer not null DEFAULT 0, archived integer not null DEFAULT 0, UNIQUE(id, guild_id, user_id))
create.create_table_guild_currencies: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS guild_currencies (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, guild_id integer NOT NULL, currency_name TEXT NOT NULL, currency_symbol TEXT NOT NULL, UNIQUE(id, guild_id))
create.create_table_guild_currency_change_costs: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS guild_currency_change_costs (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, guild_id integer NOT NULL, currency_name_cost real DEFAULT 1.00, currency_symbol_cost real DEFAULT 1.00, UNIQUE(id, guild_id))

insert.insert_user_into_guild_bank: INSERT INTO guild_bank (guild_id, user_id, balance) VALUES (?, ?, ?)

update.update_archive_bank_account: UPDATE guild_bank SET archived = 1 WHERE guild_id = ? AND user_id = ?
update.update_unarchive_bank_account: UPDATE guild_bank SET archived = 0 WHERE guild_id = ? AND user_id = ?
update.update_bank_account: UPDATE guild_bank SET balance = ? WHERE guild_id = ? AND user_id = ?
update.update_guild_currency_name: UPDATE guild_currencies SET currency_name = ? WHERE guild_id = ?
update.update_guild_currency_symbol: UPDATE guild_currencies SET currency_symbol = ? WHERE guild_id = ?
update.update_guild_currency_name_change_cost: UPDATE guild_currency_change_costs SET currency_name_cost = ? where guild_id = ?
update.update_guild_currency_symbol_change_cost: UPDATE guild_currency_change_costs SET currency_symbol_cost = ? where guild_id = ?
update.update_user_bank_balance: UPDATE guild_bank SET balance = ? WHERE guild_id = ? AND user_id = ? AND archived = 0
update.update_user_bank_balance_simple: UPDATE guild_bank SET balance = balance - ? WHERE guild_id = ? AND user_id = ? and archived = 0
update.update_set_user_bank_balance: UPDATE guild_bank SET balance = ? WHERE guild_id = ? AND user_id = ? and archived = 0
update.update_increment_bot_use: UPDATE guild_bank SET bot_use = bot_use + 1 WHERE guild_id = ? AND user_id = ? and archived = 0
update.update_reset_bot_use: UPDATE guild_bank SET bot_use = 0 WHERE archived = 0

select.select_user_bank_account_details: SELECT * FROM guild_bank WHERE guild_id = ? AND user_id = ? and archived = 0
select.select_archived_user_bank_account_detail: SELECT * FROM guild_bank WHERE guild_id = ? AND user_id = ? and archived = 1
select.select_users_for_allowance: SELECT guild_id, user_id, bot_use FROM guild_bank WHERE  bot_use > 0 AND archived = 0
